Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: lookup("Sustain. Account Category"."Emission Scope" where(Code = field(Category)))

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value: "Dimension Value".Code where("Global Dimension No." = const(1), Blocked = const(false))

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value: "Dimension Value".Code where("Global Dimension No." = const(2), Blocked = const(false))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: exist("Comment Line" where("Table Name" = const("Sustainability Account"), "No." = field("No.")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("Sustainability Ledger Entry"."Emission CO2" where("Account No." = field("No."),
                                                        "Account No." = field(filter(Totaling)),
                                                        "Responsibility Center" = field("Responsibility Center Filter"),
                                                        "Global Dimension 1 Code" = field("Global Dimension 1 Filter"),
                                                        "Global Dimension 2 Code" = field("Global Dimension 2 Filter"),
                                                        "Posting Date" = field("Date Filter"),
                                                        "Dimension Set ID" = field("Dimension Set ID Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:

                                                        "Account No." = field(filter(Totaling)),
                                                        "Responsibility Center" = field("Responsibility Center Filter"),
                                                        "Global Dimension 1 Code" = field("Global Dimension 1 Filter"),
                                                        "Global Dimension 2 Code" = field("Global Dimension 2 Filter"),
                                                        "Posting Date" = field(upperlimit("Date Filter")),
                                                        "Dimension Set ID" = field("Dimension Set ID Filter")))

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the category of the sustainability account.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the subcategory of the account category of the sustainability account.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the purpose of the account. Total: Used to total a series of balances on accounts from many different account groupings. To use Total, leave this field blank. Begin-Total: A marker for the beginning of a series of accounts to be totaled that ends with an End-Total account. End-Total: A total of a series of accounts that starts with the preceding Begin-Total account. The total is defined in the Totaling field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies whether you will be able to post directly or only indirectly to this sustainability account.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies an account interval or a list of account numbers. The entries of the account will be totaled to give a total balance. How entries are totaled depends on the value in the Account Type field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View the history of transactions that have been posted for the selected record.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View or add comments for the record.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View or edit the single set of dimensions that are set up for the selected record.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View or edit dimensions for a group of records. You can assign dimension codes to transactions to distribute costs and analyze historical information.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Limit the entries according to the dimension filters that you specify. NOTE: If you use a high number of dimension combinations, this function may not work and can result in a message that the SQL server only supports a maximum of 2100 parameters.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Indent accounts between a Begin-Total and the matching End-Total one level to make the chart of sustainability accounts easier to read.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Open the sustainability journal, for example, to record or post an emission.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View emissions details by responsibility center.

Properties.Name: AdditionalSearchTerms
Properties.Value: Sustainability Account List, Sustainability Accounts, Sustainability Overview, Sustainability Chart, CsA

Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the subcategory of the category of the sustainability account.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the scope of the emissions that are associated with the sustainability account. Scope 1: Direct emissions from sources that are owned or controlled by the reporting entity. Scope 2: Indirect emissions from the generation of purchased electricity, heat, or steam consumed by the reporting entity. Scope 3: Other indirect emissions, such as the extraction and production of purchased materials and fuels, transport-related activities in vehicles not owned or controlled by the reporting entity, and waste disposal.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies internal carbon fee that a company charges itself for each unit of CO2 equivalent that it emits. It can be configured only if the Emission Type is CO2, and it will be calculated not based on CO2 emission but based on CO2e.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the coefficient that converts the impact of various greenhouse gases into the equivalent amount of carbon dioxide based on their global warming potential. for CO2 it will be 1 by default and you cannot change this value. For other gases you need to add coefficients. If you use for example that 1 kilogram of CH4 is equivalent to 28 kilograms of CO2, to calculate this coefficient you need to use value 1/28.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Update Carbon Fees and CO2e on Posted transactions for already Posted values related to the new setup

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
exist("Comment Line" where("Table Name" = const("Sustainability Account"),
                                                     "No." = field("No.")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("Analysis View Entry"."Emission CO2" where("Analysis View Code" = field("Analysis View Filter"),
                                                                         "Business Unit Code" = field("Business Unit Filter"),
                                                                         "Account No." = field("No."),
                                                                         "Account Source" = field("Account Source"),
                                                                         "Account No." = field(filter(Totaling)),
                                                                         "Dimension 1 Value Code" = field("Dimension 1 Filter"),
                                                                         "Dimension 2 Value Code" = field("Dimension 2 Filter"),
                                                                         "Dimension 3 Value Code" = field("Dimension 3 Filter"),
                                                                         "Dimension 4 Value Code" = field("Dimension 4 Filter"),
                                                                         "Posting Date" = field("Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula

                                                                         "Account No." = field(filter(Totaling)),
                                                                         "Dimension 1 Value Code" = field("Dimension 1 Filter"),
                                                                         "Dimension 2 Value Code" = field("Dimension 2 Filter"),
                                                                         "Dimension 3 Value Code" = field("Dimension 3 Filter"),
                                                                         "Dimension 4 Value Code" = field("Dimension 4 Filter"),
                                                                         "Posting Date" = field(upperlimit("Date Filter"))))

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report presents information on greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions categorized by Sustainability Categories.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for the Emission By Category excel report. This report presents information on greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions categorized by Sustainability Categories.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for the Emission By Category RDLC report. This report presents information on greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions categorized by Sustainability Categories.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report encompasses greenhouse gas (GHG) emission data documented across various facilities - Responsibility Centers.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for the Emission Per Facility excel report. This report encompasses greenhouse gas (GHG) emission data documented across various facilities - Responsibility Centers.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for the Emission Per Facility RDLC report. This report encompasses greenhouse gas (GHG) emission data documented across various facilities - Responsibility Centers.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the report includes all sustainability entries. By default, the report does not show such entries.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report provides information on the cumulative greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions across the chosen Sustainability Accounts and periods.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for the Total Emissions excel report. This report provides information on the cumulative greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions across the chosen Sustainability Accounts and periods.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for the Total Emissions RDLC report. This report provides information on the cumulative greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions across the chosen Sustainability Accounts and periods.

Properties.Name: CalcFormula

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: count("Purchase Header" where("Document Type" = const(Order), "Sustainability Lines Exist" = const(true)))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: count("Purchase Header" where("Document Type" = const(Invoice), "Sustainability Lines Exist" = const(true)))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
count("Vendor Ledger Entry" where("Document Type" = filter(Invoice | "Credit Memo"),
                                                             "Due Date" = field("Due Next Week Filter"),
                                                             Open = const(true)))

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View or edit detailed information for the products that you trade in. The item card can be of type Inventory or Service to specify if the item is a physical unit or a labor time unit. Here you also define if items in inventory or on incoming orders are automatically reserved for outbound documents and whether order tracking links are created between demand and supply to reflect planning actions.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Baseline End Date field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Start Date field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the End Date field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Baseline for CO2. This value is automatically calculated based on Baseline Start and End Date and Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center. If the Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center fields are empty, field will show all entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Baseline for CH4. This value is automatically calculated based on Baseline Start and End Date and Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center. If the Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center fields are empty, field will show all entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Baseline for N2O. This value is automatically calculated based on Baseline Start and End Date and Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center. If the Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center fields are empty, field will show all entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the CO2 emission amount of the for the current period. This value is automatically calculated based on Start and End Date and Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center. If the Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center fields are empty, field will show all entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the CH4 emission amount of the for the current period. This value is automatically calculated based on Start and End Date and Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center. If the Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center fields are empty, field will show all entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the N2O emission amount of the for the current period. This value is automatically calculated based on Start and End Date and Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center. If the Country/Region Code and Responsibility Center fields are empty, field will show all entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Unit of Measure field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Target Value for CO2 field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Target Value for CH4 field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Target Value for N2O field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies that this sustainability goal is the main goal for the company. You can designate only one goal as the primary goal for the entire company. KPIs related to this primary goal are displayed in the Sustainability Manager role center.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Executes the Show My Goals action.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Executes the Show All Goals action.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the No. field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Name field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Owner field value. Only users designated as Sustainability Managers in the User Setup page can be selected as the owner.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the No. field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the value of the Name field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Owner field value. Only users designated as Sustainability Managers in the User Setup page can be selected as the owner.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Emission Reporting Unit of Measure Code

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Block Calculation Foundation Change If Ledger Entries Exist

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the unit of measure code that is used to register emission.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of decimal places that are shown for emission amounts. The default setting, 2:5, specifies that all amounts are shown with a minimum of 2 decimal places and a maximum of 5 decimal places. You can also enter a fixed number, such as 2, which also means that amounts are shown with two decimals.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if responsibility center is mandatory.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the change of critical setup change is blocked when sustainability entry exists.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the background error check of sustainability journal lines is enabled.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies that you want to enable sustainability features in purchase documents. Until this field is selected, sustainability fields will not be displayed in the purchase lines. Select this field only if you intend to post your GHG emissions using purchase documents or to post purchasing carbon credits.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of decimal places that are shown for fuel/electricity amounts. The default setting, 2:5, specifies that all amounts are shown with a minimum of 2 decimal places and a maximum of 5 decimal places. You can also enter a fixed number, such as 2, which also means that amounts are shown with two decimals.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of decimal places that are shown for distance measurements. The default setting, 2:5, specifies that all amounts are shown with a minimum of 2 decimal places and a maximum of 5 decimal places. You can also enter a fixed number, such as 2, which also means that amounts are shown with two decimals.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of decimal places that are shown for custom amounts. The default setting, 2:5, specifies that all amounts are shown with a minimum of 2 decimal places and a maximum of 5 decimal places. You can also enter a fixed number, such as 2, which also means that amounts are shown with two decimals.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the unit of measure code that is used to report emission.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the unit of measure factor that is used to register emission.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the size of the interval to be used when rounding emission amounts.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how the program will round emission amount.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive link to report emission.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View or add sustainability account categories.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Set up templates for the journals that you use for sustainability reporting tasks. Templates allow you to work in a journal window that is designed for a specific purpose.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Set up internal carbon fees and CO2 equivalent.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if a user is a Sustainability Manager

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the emission factor for CO2 emission.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the emission factor for CH4 emission.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the emission factor for N2O emission.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the subcategory is a part of renewable energy.
